Loading a dataset for plotting

Press the button labeled "Load Data ..." at the top left corner of the window and select a file "name_AA.txt".

The datasets open file dialog

Ploting Output *_AA.txt

After loading the dataset a graphic with the default options is displayed. The graphic can be configuring using the "Plot Options" panel.

Graphic Example

Exporting the graphic

When you close the graphic editor you may save the picture in JPG or PNG format.

Graphic output format selection

ProtDCal Protein Descriptor Calculation
